page.title: 10BELLSHILL TOWN CENTRE
page.content: {Main Street}is the main shopping area of Bellshill. However,because of better and bigger shopping facilities provided elsewhere, like ASDA in Coatbridge,and the shopping centres in Hamilton and Motherwell have drawn many people away from the Bellshill shopping areas. A Council approved survey in 1979 showed that local residents did 36% of their shopping in Bellshill Town centre,20% in local neighbourhood shops and 44% outside the area. However the building of a supermarket for FineFare has brought back many shoppers to the Main Street. With this new development and the building now completed at the corner of Emma Jay Road there is now 16,500 Square feet of commercial floorspace available in Bellshill Town centre.
